member.name: ID3D10EffectRasterizerVariable.GetBackingStore
member.summary: Get a pointer to a variable that contains rasterizer state.
member.param: Index into an array of rasterizer-state descriptions. If there is only one rasterizer variable in the effect, use 0.
A pointer to a rasterizer-state description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRasterizerVariable.GetRasterizerState
member.summary: Get a pointer to a rasterizer interface.
member.param: Index into an array of rasterizer interfaces. If there is only one rasterizer interface, use 0.
The address of a pointer to a rasterizer interface (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectRasterizerVariable
member.summary: A rasterizer-variable interface accesses rasterizer state.
